title: Latest news & season kickoff preview!
itunes:title: Latest news & season kickoff preview!
description:
A room with some heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal and Chris Wesseling -- react to the latest news around the NFL including J.J. Watt's new deal and Derek Carr being named the starter for the Raiders. Plus, a preview of the season kickoff between the Packers and Seahawks and the final "Team of ATL" nominees.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
